markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tangled Forest Rake](/Feats.aspx?ID=6036) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 126 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Tangled Forest Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6015)

**Requirements**
You are in Tangled Forest Stance. 

</column>

---

You reposition foes with raking attacks. Make a lashing branch Strike. If you hit and deal damage, you can [Reposition](/Actions.aspx?ID=2379) the target up to 10 feet. You can move the target through your space during this movement.
name: Tangled Forest Rake
requirement: You are in Tangled Forest Stance.
requirement_markdown: You are in Tangled Forest Stance.
